other_tests.findings: Normal cardiac structures, normal ventricular function and thickness (LVEF, 69%), a patent ductus arteriosus (2.3 mm) with left-to-right shunting, estimated right ventricular systolic pressure of 55 mm Hg.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Biventricular hypertrophy developed over 3 days, with preserved systolic function (LVEF, 61% on the sixth day), and no evidence of shunting across patent ductus arteriosus.

other_tests.date: On the third day of life
other_tests.findings: Grade 1 hemorrhage into the germinal matrix bilaterally.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Antibiotics were stopped due to this finding.

other_tests.findings: pH 7.35, partial pressure of carbon dioxide 47 mm Hg.
other_tests.changes_over_time: pH fluctuated, with subsequent values showing acidosis (7.24 on sixth day and 7.11 before death).

other_tests.findings: Diagnostic of systemic HSV infection involving lungs, liver, and adrenal glands.
